EmailTemplate.description: Send from Training Event to any one assigned a Learning Plan Phase III that hasn't completed within 30 days.
EmailTemplate.name: Learning Plan Completion Reminder Phase III Salesforce Basics
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Learning Plan Misses You!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your Learning Plan is Waiting!
Hi ,
I'm just checking in to see how you're doing on completing your Learning Plan Phase III Salesforce Basics https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WD_kk_5U1CHXonCWsD-od3RUgkcqZhLxa8Fbf49K9Hw/copy
Once you've fully reviewed the Learning Plan, take the Knowledge Check https://forms.gle/d3pfsP1zHM3uj4Uu6 to indicate that you've completed this training.
Please let me know any if you have any questions.
Thank You,
{!User.Name} WEX University Global Training
